text: E. Roy Lester (1923 â€“ May 3, 2020) was an American college and high school football coach. He was born in Spencer, West Virginia. He played for West Virginia from 1947 to 1949. He also coached Richard Montgomery High School and the Maryland Terrapins. Lester died in Rockville, Maryland on May 3, 2020 of COVID-19, aged 96. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football coaches Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Maryland Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia Category:Sportspeople from Maryland
title: Roy Lester
